Articles.Content:
My base is extremely deep underground, so it doesn't get destroyed.

My base.

> 
> NUKE EVERYTHING!
> My crater.

You are starting an infinite loop again, so:

The planet explodes. My debris.

I go to the Moon, and build another underground base, under a hill.

My base.

> 
> I go to the Moon, and build another underground base, under a hill.
> My base.

Where is the Moon? BEING BOMBARDED BY SPACE DEBRIS FROM EAR... Oh damn I just realised what I have done. I recreate the universe again, placing hill wanters in jail.

Since I don't want a hill, I build my underground moon base again. This time, it's not under a hill.

My base.

I invoke Globnar!

My base.

> 
> Where is the Moon? BEING BOMBARDED BY SPACE DEBRIS FROM EAR... Oh damn I just realised what I have done. I recreate the universe again, placing hill wanters in jail.

I offer you a hill. also, what if it's a hill of flies? can I be *Lord*Ã¢â‚¬â€¹ of the flies? that I made a hill out of? Can I be lord of the flies?

> 
> I offer you a hill. also, what if it's a hill of flies? can I be *Lord*Ã¢â‚¬â€¹ of the flies? that I made a hill out of? Can I be lord of the flies?

I already have a hill.

I build a toilet on Duna.

My Duna toilet.

> 
> I build a toilet on Duna.
> My Duna toilet.

Ok... I blow your toilet up and destroy all hills but mine. My hill.

I slap you off your hill.

My hill.

I repair my toilet with duct tape, I also build a sewer network under it.

My toilet connected to a sewer.
I build a hill on Ike, and also build 7 more hills on Kerbin, so that the other posters can have some.

I occupy one of the hills on kerbin and politely thank you and then make a navy to protect my hill and a smaller expeditionary force to protect yours. our hills. and the 6 empty hills for other posters.

I deploy tanks around my toilet. 

My toilet with a sewer surrounded by tanks.

I send a covert operative in to clog your toilet. Your tanks blow up as well.

My clogged toilet.

On second thought, I blow up the toilet, make a two-foot high mound of dirt, and say it's a hill.

My hill.
I go rage quit. Everything that the others own blow up. The hills are now mine

I build a small hill on Ike.

My hill.

I create another hill inside of the cleared inbox of mine.

My super subtle hint at someone who should build one of their own.

I summon our lord and savior Red Iron Crown who bans you and your hill.

I proceed to create my own hill.

My hill.

I make a decoy hill on Duna.

My hill(s).

I send an army of laser sharks to kill you.

My hill.

The sharks killed a decoy, and you found my decoy hill. I go back to my real hill.

My hill.

The laser sharks blow up every hill in sight. It's only a matter of time before they-

oops, they found you.

My hill.

My hill was on another planet, and the sharks found another decoy.

My hill.
